content: You will need to defeat the Tiger Vanguard and Stone Vanguard to obtain the Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone in order to use the Tally. Both of these bosses are mandatory bosses within Yellow Wind Ridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Ebon_Flow.md', within the main section titled 'Ebon Flow', specifically from the subsection '**Black Myth: Wukong Ebon Flow Location**'.
The content is as follows:
You will need to defeat the Tiger Vanguard and Stone Vanguard to obtain the Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone in order to use the Tally. Both of these bosses are mandatory bosses within Yellow Wind Ridge.
